Message.Title: Stock Split
Message.Msg: Witrh the way the stock has been performing lately(and for some time) I believe that no stock split is in order. Although current dividend seems low, it really is high compared to the stock pricesseveral years ago when long term traders acquired the stock. The long term investors are in good shape. Day traders are the onesthat are concerned.
